__comment01__: SPECIFY WHAT MODULES WILL BE INCLUDED IN TELEGRAM BOT

modules.__comment01__: SPECIFY revChatGPT API TYPE (currently available only 1 or 3)
modules.__comment04__: Default module for handling user messages (see RequestResponseContainer.py)
modules.__comment05__: Automatically change user module to handle plain messages after specific command

chatgpt.__comment02__: MODEL NAME FOR API TYPE 3 (default: gpt-3.5-turbo)
chatgpt.__comment03__: FOR API TYPE 1 ACCESS TOKEN IS RECOMMENDED. GET IT FROM https://chat.openai.com/api/auth/session
chatgpt.__comment04__: OR SESSION_TOKEN (FROM COOKIES ON chat.openai.com AS __Secure-next-auth.session-token
chatgpt.__comment05__: SET TO TRUE IF YOU HAVE PAID ACCOUNT
chatgpt.__comment06__: URL FOR API REQUESTS. ONLY FOR API TYPE 1. SPECIFY NOTHING TO USE DEFAULT VALUE
chatgpt.__comment07__: IF NEEDED, SPECIFY PROXY IN THE http://IP:PORT FORMAT (SPECIFY HTTP EVEN IF IT IS HTTPS PROXY)
chatgpt.__comment08__: MINIMUM INTERVAL (IN SECONDS) BETWEEN EACH CHATGPT REQUEST

edgegpt.__comment03__: IF NEEDED, SPECIFY PROXY IN THE http://IP:PORT FORMAT (SPECIFY HTTP EVEN IF IT IS HTTPS PROXY)

dalle.__comment01__: FOR REQUESTS TO DALL-E PROVIDE YOUR API_KEY FROM https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys
dalle.__comment02__: SPECIFY FORMAT OF GENERATED IMAGES (256x256 or 512x512 or 1024x1024)
dalle.__comment03__: IF NEEDED, SPECIFY PROXY IN THE http://IP:PORT FORMAT (SPECIFY HTTP EVEN IF IT IS HTTPS PROXY)

telegram.__comment01__: PROVIDE YOUR BOT API KEY FROM https://t.me/BotFather
telegram.__comment03__: SPECIFY THE chat_id OF THOSE WHO CAN USE ADMINISTRATOR COMMANDS
telegram.__comment04__: SET TO TRUE TO BLOCK NEW USERS BY DEFAULT (WHITELIST)
telegram.__comment05__: SPECIFY THE SIZE OF THE REQUEST QUEUE AND WHETHER TO SHOW A MESSAGE ABOUT ADDING TO THE QUEUE
